QuestData.Title: All Our Friends Are Dead
QuestData.Description: Something's wrong here, $n.$B$BThe ship's crew has been slain. Yet there is no bloodshed or damage to the ship's structure.$B$BThis was not the Horde's doing.$B$BWe will find the answers we seek by speaking to the spirits of the dead. They have not yet left this world.$B$BTake this totem and place it near the corpses of the fallen. You will have a few seconds to listen to their last few thoughts.$B$BBeware, however! There is no telling how the spirits of the dead will react to our prodding.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Spirit Totem on the corpses of 6 Slain Crew Members.
QuestData.CompletionText: The spirits always have something to say to those who will listen.
QuestData.RewardText: We were bound to run into the Twilight's Hammer sooner or later, $n. If they're behind this, it's quite likely that the World Pillar fragment is in their possession.
